text: A rolling stock company (ROSCO) or rolling stock leasing company owns and maintains railway engines and carriages which are leased to train operating companies who operate the trains. == Africa == * Sheltam GrindrodRailwaysAfrica 2007/6 p. 6 * Swifambo Rail Leasing == Australia == * CFCL Australia == United States == * Chicago Freight Car Leasing Co. (CFCL) == United Kingdom == * Angel Trains * Eversholt Rail Group * Porterbrook == References == Category:Rolling stock leasing companies
title: Rolling stock company
